lead_paragraph: Buddy Hield powered Oklahoma’s rise to the top of the rankings, and he very likely will become the third player born in the Bahamas drafted into the N.B.A.

headline.print_headline: Bahamians Take Pride as a Native Lifts Oklahoma
headline.main: Bahamians Take Pride as a Sooner Stands Out

snippet: Buddy Hield powered Oklahoma’s rise to the top of the rankings, and he very likely will become the third player born in the Bahamas drafted into the N.B.A.
abstract: Oklahoma guard Buddy Hield is likely to become third native of Bahamas to be drafted into NBA.
